plot outline: Aishwarya and Vaibhav are aimless and jobless they only desire fun in life by spending their father Dhananjay Dhanawde's money also sell his personal car by telling the buyer that their father is suffering from memory loss which irks him.They meet Preeti and Priya and fall in love and go to meet their mother Sadhna along with Dhananjay.Dhananjay and Sadhna were lovers earlier and now want to get married as both are widower's.Preeti and Priya support the decision while Vaibav and Aishwarya are want to stop this marriage.Where in Madhu arrives posing as Dhananjay's wife.
title: Hututu
plot: Aishwarya and Vaibhav are aimless and jobless they only desire fun in life by spending their father Dhananjay Dhanawde's money also sell his personal car by telling the buyer that their father is suffering from memory loss which irks him.They meet Preeti and Priya and fall in love and go to meet their mother Sadhna along with Dhananjay.Dhananjay and Sadhna were lovers earlier and now want to get married as both are widower's.Preeti and Priya support the decision while Vaibav and Aishwarya are want to stop this marriage.Where in Madhu arrives posing as Dhananjay's wife.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
